    • Class com.riskybusiness.neural.Neuron extends Object implements Serializable

      serialVersionUID:
      37641900214726419L

      • Serialized Fields

        • inputs

          float[] inputs

          The inputs that are saved for the Neuron until it can fire. All inputs in this implementation must be positive.

        • weights

          float[] weights

          The weights for each input of the Neuron. These weights line up according to the order in which the inputs were received.

        • learningRate

          float learningRate

          The rate at which the weights are adjusted while in the training phase.

    • Class com.riskybusiness.neural.StepNeuron extends Neuron implements Serializable

      serialVersionUID:
      607098269654808303L

      • Serialized Fields

        • threshold

          float threshold

          The value that will determine whether or not the StepNeuron will fire. It will only fire if the sum found is greater than or equal to the threshold.

    • Class com.riskybusiness.neural.Synapse extends Object implements Serializable

      serialVersionUID:
      3646014859697821258L

      • Serialized Fields

        • neuronIndex

          int neuronIndex

          The index for the input of the sender Neuron to the receiver Neuron.

          See Also:
          Synapse.sender, Synapse.receiver

        • sender

          Neuron sender

          The Neuron that sends the information.

        • receiver

          Neuron receiver

          The Neuron that recieves the information.
